content: I do not have the capability to browse the internet and access current news and events. however, i can tell you that many companies around the world have taken proactive steps to tackle systemic racism and discrimination. some have established diversity and inclusion initiatives, implemented policies to promote fairness, conducted training sessions, and more. it is important to keep in mind that systemic racism and discrimination are complex issues, and there is no quick or easy solution. however, by taking proactive steps and being committed to making changes, companies can make progress towards positive change.
